divs: sighting detailsi was on the front pourch at my grannys house something caught my eye it was a gold\copper color flying saucer spinning slowley with windows all around reflecting from the light of the moon you can see inside the interior was just white i can see it very clearly the moon was on my right side the flying saucer was moving to the right it was so beatiful didnt take my eyes of it till it faded away i told everyone what i seen i will never foget its clear on mind always
Summary: flying saucer spins slowley windows reflect from the light of the moon interior was white
